#########################################################################
model{
	C <- 100000
	# Truco de los ceros
	for (i in 1:N){
		zZ[i] <- 0
		zZ[i] ~ dpois(phi[i])
		fZ[i] <- (alphaZ / sZ) * pow(z[i]/sZ , -alphaZ - 1) * exp(-pow(z[i]/sZ , -alphaZ))
		phi[i] <- -log(fZ[i]) + C
	}
	# Aprioris O3
	alphaZ ~  dunif(0,10)
	sZ ~ dunif(0,200)
}

data
list(z=c(341, 276, 276, 316, 319, 249, 361, 403, 269, 274, 333, 332, 254, 331, 375, 309, 342, 360, 324, 340, 342, 404, 342, 368, 243, 394, 475, 413, 303, 277, 305, 320, 223, 330, 259, 402, 311, 370, 277, 244, 233, 271, 269, 281, 246, 279, 328, 342, 299, 244, 273, 247, 304, 275, 259, 292, 288, 312, 256, 305, 281, 266, 341, 272, 255, 320, 349, 274, 286, 260, 260, 299, 286, 288, 230, 233, 269, 268, 285, 245, 291, 323, 254, 257, 234, 241, 235, 309, 264, 278, 271, 278, 274, 246, 271, 246, 194, 257, 266, 250, 295, 295, 258, 276, 234, 270, 274, 263, 309, 248, 241, 246, 240, 219, 236, 254, 223, 321, 232, 270, 228, 268, 242, 257, 282, 219, 242, 204, 257, 281, 250, 245, 243, 209, 252, 216, 250, 248, 240, 243, 211, 216, 193, 220, 264, 243, 223, 245, 227, 228, 223, 233, 284, 235, 217, 225, 181, 203, 198, 180, 237, 213, 199, 198, 195, 209, 196, 187, 180, 197, 150, 189, 226, 182, 196, 183, 182, 197, 175, 182, 222, 196, 162, 204, 188, 161, 183, 178, 191, 176, 169, 160, 170, 167, 179, 186, 190, 172, 158, 157, 191, 186, 177, 139, 154, 155, 169, 203, 185, 194, 202, 160, 157, 154, 137, 177, 157, 156, 156, 178, 189, 162, 158, 176, 156, 126, 128, 163, 148, 198, 180, 144, 177, 164, 144, 138, 153, 174, 161, 141, 134, 152, 163, 163, 208, 174, 132, 145, 128, 172, 152, 131, 121, 154, 176, 153, 184, 177, 138, 154, 139, 126, 177, 149, 117, 128, 176, 143, 156, 152, 140, 128, 145, 130, 175, 141, 146, 129, 146, 162, 173, 141, 132, 133, 133, 142, 123, 107, 121, 164, 182, 149, 185, 165, 131, 125, 140, 135, 121, 131, 130, 134, 160, 169, 165, 179, 155, 143, 147, 176, 146, 143, 133, 152, 210, 160, 196, 147, 156, 162, 141, 139, 111, 117, 133, 147, 132, 158, 185, 153, 157, 133, 148, 157, 125, 117, 131, 143, 143, 152, 149, 163, 128, 128, 131, 138, 157, 143, 128, 144, 159, 156, 150, 150, 132, 141, 126, 124, 99, 119, 121, 133, 139, 134, 146, 133, 135, 133, 124, 144, 159, 115, 114, 152, 141, 159, 144, 158, 140, 123, 142, 150, 140, 140), N=384)
